title: Year
definition: Extract the year from the date

title: Month
definition: Extract the month from the date

title: Day
definition: Extract the day from the date

title: Week
definition: Extract the week from the date

title: Day of week (dow)
definition: Extract the day of week from the date

title: Day of year (doy)
definition: Extract the day of year from the date

title: YearMonth
definition: Extract the yearMonth from the date YYYY-MM

title: MonthDay
definition: Extract the monthDay from the date MM-DD

title: YearWeek
definition: Extract the yearWeek from the date YYYY-'W'WW

title: Hour
definition: Extract the hours from the TimeStamp

title: Minute
definition: Extract the minutes from the TimeStamp

title: Second
definition: Extract the seconds from the TimeStamp

title: hourMinute
definition: Extract the hourMinute from the date HH:MM
